critique: This document pertains to the allocation of funds for soil examination, surveys, and investigations by the Bureau of Chemistry and Soils. It is an amendment to Executive Order No. 6208 and involves a specific allocation of $35,000. Given the nature of the document, it has minimal implications for ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, or social inclusion. However, it does represent a slight intervention in the economy through government spending on agricultural research.
